mapper.insert: insert into videostar(boardId, accountId, star, reg_date) values(#{boardId}, #{accountId}, #{star}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE videostar SET star = +#{star} WHERE boardId=#{boardId} and accountId=#{accountId}
mapper.select: select star from videostar where boardId = #{boardId} and accountId = #{accountId}
select subject, accountId, boardId, SUM(star) sstar from videoBoard b, accounts ac where b.accountId = ac.accountId order by sstar desc
